catalog_info.title: Introduction to Still Photography
catalog_info.notes: Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure. No previous studio experience necessary. Interested students must attend first meeting of class during shopping week to speak with teaching staff about course enrollment procedure.
catalog_info.description: Introduction to still photography through individual and group exercises, with an emphasis on the medium as a vehicle for expression, documentation, and personal vision. Covers necessary technical, historical, and aesthetic aspects of the medium.
